metadata.title: CVE-2017-17042 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: lib/yard/core_ext/file.rb in the server in YARD before 0.9.11 does not block relative paths with an initial ../ sequence, which allows attackers to conduct directory traversal attacks and read arbitrary files.

criterions.comment: yard package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.12-2').
